Package org.apache.lens.driver.jdbc

Interface Summary
ConnectionProvider The Interface ConnectionProvider.
 

Class Summary
ColumnarSQLRewriter The Class ColumnarSQLRewriter.
DataSourceConnectionProvider The Class DataSourceConnectionProvider.
JDBCDriver This driver is responsible for running queries against databases which can be queried using the JDBC API.
JDBCDriver.DummyQueryRewriter The Class DummyQueryRewriter.
JDBCDriverConfConstants The Interface JDBCDriverConfConstants.
JDBCResultSet The Class JDBCResultSet.
JDBCResultSet.FieldSchemaData FieldSchemaData is created so that we don't save FieldSchema as some classes used by it don't have default constructors which are required by jackson
JDBCResultSet.JDBCResultSetMetadata Result set metadata of a JDBC query
